author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-313. rb: BinaryProtocolAccelerated and BinaryProtocol don't produce the same bytes when writes aren't strict
A Fixnum was not properly being converted to its native value before being written. This patch rectifies that problem.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: They're gone. Don't add any new ones!
